cheatsheet.title: Adding a Native component built from C-source

intro.description: Add a Native component built from c-source by using content assist.

item.title: Edit the native unit's name
item.description: The name of the unit should be the fully qualified name expected by the system when component is built.

subitem.label: Modify the "componentName" to reflect the name of the built component.

item.title: Edit the component's version
item.description: The component's version should reflect the wanted version of the component (typically a rpm:version).

subitem.label: Modify the rpm version specification after the 'rpm:' version type prefix.

item.title: Edit the component's location.
item.description: The source location of the native unit should be a URI (URL) where the c-source can be obtained.

subitem.label: Modify the 'componentURI' to reflect where the c-source can be fetched.
Press TAB to finish the templates.
